meanings.definition: The act or process of covering a roof with materials such as shingles or metal.
meanings.sent1: The roofing of our house was completed last week.
meanings.sent2: The roofing on the barn was damaged in the storm.
meanings.sent3: I tried my hand at roofing, but ended up with shingles everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The roofing of the city echoed with the sound of raindrops.
meanings.sent5: The roofing job required precision and skill to ensure no leaks.

meanings.definition: The materials used to cover a roof, such as shingles or metal sheets.
meanings.sent1: The roofing for the new building arrived in bundles.
meanings.sent2: Metal roofing is known for its durability and longevity.
meanings.sent3: The shingles for the roofing project were as colorful as a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The roofing material gleamed in the sunlight, making the house stand out.
meanings.sent5: Choosing the right roofing can enhance the overall look of a house.
